entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: SSE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
